#summary Forward-proxy configuration for consumer sites / Relying Parties

= Consumer Forward Proxy =

If your Relying Party / consumer site needs to access the internet through a proxy, this is how the proxy access info is configured:

{{{
// --- Forward proxy setup (only if needed) ---
ProxyProperties proxyProps = new ProxyProperties();
proxyProps.setProxyName("proxy.example.com");
proxyProps.setProxyPort(8080);
HttpClientFactory.setProxyProperties(proxyProps);
}}}
